title: Vegetariano Roma
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Take-out, Mexican, Caribbean
description: Veggie buffet built in a former White Castle Building. Veggie burgers, Caribbean cuisine, vegan macaroni and cheese. Part of a chain throughout the city offering Mexican vegetarian breakfast, lunch, dinner - egg omelettes, ensaladas (salads), enchiladas, breads, juices, and meals of the day. Cheese is used in many dishes, so ask for without cheese if vegan.
